use-ttw: I read and post in this community
use-mailing-list: I do not engage with this community
use-reddit: I read/lurk, but do not post

use-github-discuss: I read and post in this community
value-of-tw:
As a safe vault for ideas, that might be useful in a long future.

Record personal information safely, no one else will see, and I can analyse it to improve my self.

Save time developing small widgets to record personal info, without handling save&load mechanism myself.
